titleInfo.title: Alison Krauss and Cox Family at Rounder Records

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black on split fountain, yellow to red) announcing Alison Krauss and the Cox Family. Poster contains the text, "Rounder Records welcomes you! Please sign in." Poster features metal photoplates of a violin (fiddle) and a policeman next to a stop sign.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
